Name: Brazuca

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: Barzilian treats and nice coffee - a bit on the pricey side and not the fastest service. Great location for people watching as well.

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: Nice Brazilian cafe. Good coffee, some local dishes made from acai.

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: Stopped by for some chai latte. Delicious. Husband enjoyed the hot chocolate. Friendly staff. They offered free heated pastries due to closing time in an hour or so. They also offer loyalty stamp cards. Will come again! :)

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: Great coffee üëçüèº but the place small and busy

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: Enjoyed the coffee and the atmosphere, but I wasn't really impressed by both. The perfectly circular finger ring of the cups gives you little grip to prevent them to rotate towards your hand and get scolded by the hot coffee. The cheesecake was quite good.

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: My favorite coffee bar around the corner. Not too big, so not too much noise. Suitable to both study/work and have lunch/coffee with friends. Luv their music selection which is mainly jazz, playing softly in the background. On the menu: coffee, thee, juices, acai bowls, sweets and bites; all sorts of loveliness from Brasil.

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: Excellent coffee, a bit pricey considering the rather modest interior. Waiting time is a bit long, they also brought me a small coffee even though I paid for a large one. The staff seems to be a bit confused when it's busy and tends to mix up the orders sometimes.

Name: Brazuca
Review Text:
Pricey, but worth it
If you can bare to part with ‚Ç¨4 for a really good cup of coffee, do it here. The tiny terrace is always packed when the sun's out, but it's perfect for people watching in de Pijp.

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: Staff was super friendly. So much indeed that i would like to give a better rating. I am not a coffee connoiseur so i cannot rate on that. The gin tonic I had instead tasted very watered down, sorry.

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: Orderes a Latte to go, and had to wait 15 mins. Because the guy decided he needed to finish a large order for customers that were eating in. Pretty certain 'to go' stands for 'make it fast dear, don't have time to sit around'

Name: Brazuca

Name: Brazuca

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: We ordered and have been sitting for more than half and hour and they didn't notice that our order hadn't been made. We waited patiently. Didn't want to be rude. But you can't forget a client and an order, and serve everybody except us.

Name: Brazuca
Review Text: The most weird experience. We weren't allowed to order coffee to go because they were supposedly busy. And it wasn't even busy at all. Good ol' Amsterdam arrogance. Bubye!
